sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Obi Chukwuka Okonjo, bụ nwanne Dr Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, nakwa ndị ezinụlọ di ya gwara BBC Igbo etu obi dị ha dịka e nyere nwanne ha ọkwa onyeisioche otu World Trade Organisation (WTO).
Cheta na Obi Chukwuka Okonjo bụ eze ọdịnala nke obodo Ogwashiukwu na Delta steeti.
BBC Igbo gara n'ụlọ ya Obi Chukwuka Okonjo, ma gakwaa n'ezinaụlọ dị ya n'Umuda dị n'Abia steeti, ka ha kọọrọ anyị ụdị mmadụ nwanne ha nakwa nwunye ha bụ.
Kirie ihe ha kwuru n'onyoonyo a:
Ndị rụrụ ya Adline Okere, Chris Okereke, Ebere Ekeopara na Nnamdi Agbanelo.
Ikemba Iweala: Ihe ị maghị maka odogwu nwoke a bụ di Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala
Ngọzị Okonjo-Iweala nwereike bụrụ nwaanyị mbụ ga-achị 'World Trade Organisation'
'Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala ga-arụ ọrụ ya ọfụma dịka onyeisi WTO' - Buhari16 Febụwarị 2021
